## WorkerBasedDecoder.configure() method

Configure tile decoder service in workers.

Broadcasts \[\[ConfigurationMessage\]\] to all \[\[TileDecoderService\]\]s running in worker pool.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
configure(styleSet?: StyleSet, definitions?: Definitions, languages?: string[], options?: OptionsMap): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  styleSet | [StyleSet](./harp-datasource-protocol.styleset.md) | new \[\[StyleSet\]\], undefined means no change |
|  definitions | [Definitions](./harp-datasource-protocol.definitions.md) |  |
|  languages | string\[\] | new list of languages |
|  options | [OptionsMap](./harp-datasource-protocol.optionsmap.md) | new options, undefined options are not changed |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
